entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
